mapper.insert: insert into firm_insures (id, `name`, linkman, mobile, province, city, district, address, `disable`, enterprise, update_by, create_by, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{enterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update firm_insures set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district = #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `disable` = #{disable,jdbcType=BIT}, enterprise = #{enterprise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, linkman, mobile, province, city, district, address, `disable`, enterprise, update_by, create_by, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at from firm_insures where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
